TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed RingerMode extends System.Enum

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.RingerMode Normal = int32(2)

summary.para: Ringer mode that may be audible and may vibrate. It will be audible if the volume before changing out of this mode was audible. It will vibrate if the vibrate setting is on.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.RingerMode Silent = int32(0)

summary.para: Ringer mode that will be silent and will not vibrate. (This overrides the vibrate setting.)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.RingerMode Vibrate = int32(1)

summary.para: Ringer mode that will be silent and will vibrate. (This will cause the phone ringer to always vibrate, but the notification vibrate to only vibrate if set.)
